pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is what the game was built with. Let me know if it runs on an older system on twitter @DosGatitosGames or in the steam community page thanks.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ryzen 5 2600
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
